text: John Patrick Joyce (born February 8, 1957) is an American dermatologist and politician. He is the U.S. representative for , serving since 2019. He is a member of the Republican Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman John Joyce official U.S. House website *John Joyce for Congress * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Pennsylvania Category:People from Altoona, Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: John Joyce (American politician)
